reviews.content: Doesn’t work :( regretting the iOS upgrade already
It doesn’t protect against force restarts, but it does a good job with everything else. Good tweak!
Works but you can’t change the alert message.
Using same settings as my iPhone 6S on iOS 12.4 (Unc0ver). Unfortunately, it doesn’t work on 13.3.1 on my SE (checkra1n).
